text: The following is a list of episodes of the Disney Channel original series, Austin & Ally. Created by Kevin Kopelow and Heath Seifert, the show follows the partnership between polar opposites — Austin, an extroverted musician/singer, and Ally, an intelligent yet shy songwriter and their two best friends, Trish and Dez. Austin is played by Ross Lynch, Ally is played by Laura Marano, Trish is played by Raini Rodriguez, and Dez is played by Calum Worthy. The four of them eventually become best friends and the series is based on their friendship, team work and talents, as they encounter many difficulties along the way to success. == Series overview == == Episodes == === Season 1 (2011–12) === === Season 2 (2012–13) === === Season 3 (2013–14) === === Season 4 (2015–16) === == References == Category:Lists of television series episodes
title: List of Austin & Ally episodes
